blocks.subject: Vitol S.A.
text: Vitol's attorney has been in contact with Sara Shackleton of our Houston
legal team regarding the updating of our old Master Agreement into an ISDA.
However, our old agreement contains no MAC clauses.  Further, I note from
your CAS analysis that the most recent financial statements you had available
were year end 1998.  Did we request more current data from Vitol?  Did Vitol
We have a teleconference scheduled with their attorney at 10am Houston time
tomorrow (Tuesday).  If you can shoot me a response to these questions before
then, I would appreciate it.  If not, please get back to me at your earliest
